original_text: But Jerusalem's people have refused to obey my rules and my commands. They have become more wicked than the nations and countries around them. They have not obeyed my laws.
korean_text: 그가 내 규례를 거슬러서 이방인보다 악을 더 행하며 내 율례도 그리함이 그를 둘러 있는 나라들보다 더하니 이는 그들이 내 규례를 버리고 내 율례를 행하지 아니하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: But Jerusalem's people have refused to obey my rules
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 예루살렘 백성들은 나의 규칙을 순종하기를 거부했으며

sentences.original_text: They have become more wicked than the nations
They have not obeyed my laws
